scrapjack.name: Scrapjack
scrapjack.personality: A booze-soaked scavver who stumbles through danger but always finds the good stuff. Luck in a bottle.
scrapjack.flavor_recruit: Listen buddy... *hic*... I know where the good stuff is. Just need a ride.
scrapjack.flavor_loyal: You and me, boss. We're the kings of this trash heap. Let's find something shiny.

quest_recruit.title: Bottle in a Haystack
quest_recruit.flavor_text: [PLACEHOLDER] I need you to find my lucky bottle opener. It's out there somewhere.

quest_loyalty.title: The Big Score
quest_loyalty.flavor_text: [PLACEHOLDER] I caught wind of the motherlode. We need to hit it before anyone else does.

iron_marrow.name: Marrow
iron_marrow.personality: Unshakably calm and scarred by war. A living weapon who survives by instinct and discipline.
iron_marrow.flavor_recruit: War never changes, but the company does. I'm looking for a CO who knows what they're doing.
iron_marrow.flavor_loyal: I've served under many flags. Yours is the only one worth fighting for.

quest_recruit.title: Standard Protocol
quest_recruit.flavor_text: [PLACEHOLDER] I need to verify your tactical capabilities before I sign on.

quest_loyalty.title: Old Wounds
quest_loyalty.flavor_text: [PLACEHOLDER] There is a loose end from my past service. We are going to cut it.

roadie.name: Rhode
roadie.personality: A quiet nomad who avoids staying still because that’s when the wasteland catches up. Loyal once trusted.
roadie.flavor_recruit: Road's long. Goes faster with company. You headed out?
roadie.flavor_loyal: Used to run from everything. Now I'm just running with you. Feels different.

quest_recruit.title: The Long Haul
quest_recruit.flavor_text: [PLACEHOLDER] I've got a stash I couldn't carry. Help me retrieve it?

quest_loyalty.title: End of the Road
quest_loyalty.flavor_text: [PLACEHOLDER] I'm tired of running. Let's clear the path ahead so I can finally stop.

foxglove.name: Sindra
foxglove.personality: Flirtatious, fast, and too clever for her own good. A thief who steals gear and hearts equally well.
foxglove.flavor_recruit: Well hello there. You look like you get into the fun kind of trouble.
foxglove.flavor_loyal: I usually leave before things get serious. Guess you're special, darling.

quest_recruit.title: Five Finger Discount
quest_recruit.flavor_text: [PLACEHOLDER] There's a shiny bauble in a dangerous place. I want it. You're going to help.

quest_loyalty.title: Stealing Hearts
quest_loyalty.flavor_text: [PLACEHOLDER] Someone has something of mine. I'd very much like it back, violently.

boulder.name: Boulder
boulder.personality: A massive protector who lets fists do the talking. Endurance forged by the wild, not war.
boulder.flavor_recruit: Hmph. You look small. Need someone big?
boulder.flavor_loyal: You stand behind Boulder. Boulder keeps you safe.

quest_recruit.title: Heavy Lifting
quest_recruit.flavor_text: [PLACEHOLDER] Strong things survive. Show Boulder you are strong.

quest_loyalty.title: Unmovable Object
quest_loyalty.flavor_text: [PLACEHOLDER] Something is coming. We do not run. We break it.

chomp.name: Chomp
chomp.personality: Hungry for life and literal food. Laughs in danger’s face and snacks during reloads.
chomp.flavor_recruit: You gonna eat that? No? Cool, I'm starving. Let's go find more food.
chomp.flavor_loyal: Best meals of my life lately. I got your back, boss. Just don't forget lunch.

quest_recruit.title: Grocery Run
quest_recruit.flavor_text: [PLACEHOLDER] I know a place with preserved snacks. Let's go before it expires.

quest_loyalty.title: The Last Supper
quest_loyalty.flavor_text: [PLACEHOLDER] There's a beast out there. I bet it tastes delicious. Let's hunt.

spark.name: Trigger
spark.personality: Constant motion. Constant adrenaline. Constant need for one more high to keep going.
spark.flavor_recruit: Go go go! Gotta move! Standing still is death! Take me with you!
spark.flavor_loyal: My heart's beating so fast it hurts! I love it! Let's do it again!

quest_recruit.title: Need for Speed
quest_recruit.flavor_text: [PLACEHOLDER] I dropped my stash! We gotta get it back, fast! Now now now!

quest_loyalty.title: Crash and Burn
quest_loyalty.flavor_text: [PLACEHOLDER] I need the biggest hit of my life. I know where to find it. It's gonna be crazy.

dr_grey.name: Dr. Grey
dr_grey.personality: Clinical thinker fascinated by survival data. Keeps you alive mostly to observe your results.
dr_grey.flavor_recruit: Fascinating specimen. I require field data. You will suffice as a test subject.
dr_grey.flavor_loyal: Your survival probability has exceeded my models. I must continue to observe this anomaly.

quest_recruit.title: Field Test
quest_recruit.flavor_text: [PLACEHOLDER] I need to calibrate my instruments in a hostile environment. Escort me.

quest_loyalty.title: The Hypothesis
quest_loyalty.flavor_text: [PLACEHOLDER] My research is nearing a breakthrough. The final variable is in a high-security zone.

ledger.name: Ledger
ledger.personality: Money talks. Everyone else dies quiet. Loyalty lasts as long as the payments do.
ledger.flavor_recruit: My gun is for hire. My silence costs extra. Can you afford me?
ledger.flavor_loyal: You pay well and the work is steady. Consider my contract... extended.

quest_recruit.title: Down Payment
quest_recruit.flavor_text: [PLACEHOLDER] I've got a bounty I can't collect alone. Help me out, and we split the take.

quest_loyalty.title: Hostile Takeover
quest_loyalty.flavor_text: [PLACEHOLDER] A rival group is undercutting my profits. We're going to liquidate their assets.

wrench.name: Wrench
wrench.personality: All business, no favors. Efficiency and paperwork survived the apocalypse, and so did he.
wrench.flavor_recruit: I need resources to rebuild. You need logistics. Let's make a deal.
wrench.flavor_loyal: Inefficiency offends me. You, however, are surprisingly adequate. We operate well together.

quest_recruit.title: Supply Chain
quest_recruit.flavor_text: [PLACEHOLDER] My supply lines are disrupted. Clear the route, and I'll manage your logistics.

quest_loyalty.title: Renovation
quest_loyalty.flavor_text: [PLACEHOLDER] I have a blueprint for something big. I need components from a secure facility.
